treatment.name: Tennis Elbow (Lateral Epicondylitis)
precautions: Stretch and warm up before repetitive motions

technique.name: Arthroscopy
technique.description: Arthroscopy is a minimally invasive surgical procedure that uses a small camera to visualize and treat joint problems.

technique.name: Joint Replacement Surgery
technique.description: Joint replacement surgery involves replacing damaged or arthritic joints with artificial implants to relieve pain and improve function.

technique.name: Fracture Fixation
technique.description: Fracture fixation techniques realign fractured bones using screws, plates, or rods to stabilize them during healing.

technique.name: Physical Therapy
technique.description: Physical therapy involves exercise programs, manual therapy, and modalities to aid in recovery and improve mobility.

technique.name: Spinal Fusion
technique.description: Spinal fusion surgery joins vertebrae to stabilize the spine and reduce pain caused by conditions like degenerative disc disease.

technique.name: Pediatric Orthopedics
technique.description: Pediatric orthopedics focuses on treating musculoskeletal issues in children, including congenital conditions and growth-related .
